infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to scan QR codes with COVID-19 vaccine certificates. This allows verifiers to verify the authenticity of COVID-19 vaccine certificates presented to them.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app uses the microphone as part of the camera usage to scan QR codes with COVID-19 vaccine certificates. This allows verifiers to verify the authenticity of COVID-19 vaccine certificates presented to them.
